statements: DELETE FROM shipment_tracking WHERE pickup_location = 'New York' AND delivery_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM shipment_tracking WHERE pickup_location = 'New York' AND delivery_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 'db023a4f-8a04-4fb2-ba8e-ef339b18e0c1' AND current_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM shipments_history WHERE shipment_id = 'a1fa19bb-6d52-4276-9273-7baf763c233f' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND last_reported_location = POINT(37.7749, -122.4194)
DELETE FROM route_history WHERE driver_id = 205 AND start_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM shipment_history WHERE shipment_id = 12345 AND status = 'Delivered';
